original_title: 俺の娘が姉のように慕う隣に住む巨乳女子大生を犯して性処理玩具にした日々。
overview: Three years after retiring early due to disgust with human relations at work, I have not been able to find a new job and have almost no retirement allowance remaining from my house loan and living expenses. While I was staying at home, my neighbor's daughter was a college student. She unconsciously flirts with sex appeal and her body is trying to change from a girl to a woman. It wouldn't be strange if that body already remembered the man. When she thinks of her, her chest feels tight. When she was little, she treated me innocently, but recently she started to look at me with cold eyes...
title: Every Day My Daughter Rapes A Busty Female College Student Who Lives Next Door And Treats Her Like An Older Sister. Himesaki Hana
